trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is a base class for WPF core level implementations building on Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements and basic presentation characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 是 WPF 核心级实现的基类，这些实现是在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素和基本表示特性上生成的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> provides a starting point for element layout characteristics, and also exposes virtual methods that derived classes can override, which can influence the layout rendering behavior of the element and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 用于元素布局特征，并作为派生类的虚方法可以重写，这可能会影响呈现行为的元素及其子元素的布局的公开提供一个起始点。

trans-unit.source: Much of the input and focusing behavior for elements in general is also defined in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的输入和焦点的元素的行为通常中也定义<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类。

trans-unit.source: This includes the events for keyboard, mouse and stylus input, and related status properties.
trans-unit.target: 这包括键盘、 鼠标和触笔输入和相关的状态属性的事件。

trans-unit.source: Many of these events are routed events, and many of the input-related events have both a bubbling routing version as well as a tunneling version of the event.
trans-unit.target: 其中许多事件是路由的事件，并且有许多输入相关的事件的这两个冒泡路由版本，以及事件的隧道版本。

trans-unit.source: These paired events are typically the events of greatest interest to control authors.
trans-unit.target: 这些成对的事件通常是控件作者最感兴趣的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> also includes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that relate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] event model, including methods that can raise specified routed events that are sourced from an element instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 此外包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]与相关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件模型，包括可以引发指定的方法路由源自元素实例的事件。

trans-unit.source: In terms of architecture, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be considered roughly equivalent to a window handle in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, or an Element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dhtml](~/includes/tlasharptla-dhtml-md.md)] programming.
trans-unit.target: 根据体系结构，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>就被认为是大致相当于窗口句柄以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]编程中或中的某个元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dhtml](~/includes/tlasharptla-dhtml-md.md)]编程。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is a base element at the WPF core level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 是 WPF 核心级别的基本元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> has the following capabilities that are specifically defined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> class:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>具有以下功能专门定义的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类：

trans-unit.source: Can render as a child element (<xref:System.Windows.UIElement> derives from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, a high level graphics class)
trans-unit.target: 可以呈现为子元素 (<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>派生自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>，高级别图形类)

trans-unit.source: Contains logic that is used to size and position possible child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> (when interpreted by a layout system)
trans-unit.target: 包含用于调整大小和位置可能具有的子元素的逻辑<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>（时由布局系统解释）

trans-unit.source: Can respond to user input (including control of where input is getting sent to via their handling of event routing, or routing of commands)
trans-unit.target: 可响应用户输入 （包括控件的位置输入获取发送到通过其处理的路由或路由的命令的事件）

trans-unit.source: Can raise routed events that travel a route through the logical element tree
trans-unit.target: 可以引发逻辑元素树路由的路由的事件

trans-unit.source: Supports some aspects of the animation system
trans-unit.target: 支持动画系统的某些方面

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is the WPF framework-level implementation class that builds on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, and adds specific interactions with the WPF framework level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 是基于 WPF 框架级别实现类<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，并添加与 WPF 框架级别的特定交互。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> adds and defines the following capabilities:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 添加并定义了以下功能：

trans-unit.source: Additional framework-specific layout characteristics
trans-unit.target: 其他特定于框架的布局特征

trans-unit.source: Support for richer metadata reporting on properties
trans-unit.target: 支持更丰富的元数据属性报告

trans-unit.source: Class-specific implementation of certain input base classes and their attached properties or attached events
trans-unit.target: 某些类特定的实现输入基类，这些类和其附加的属性或附加事件

trans-unit.source: Style support
trans-unit.target: 样式支持

trans-unit.source: Further animation support
trans-unit.target: 进一步动画支持

trans-unit.source: Another related class is <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 另一个相关类是<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> class implements many of the same members as does <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>; the difference between these two classes has to do with their intended place in the overall content model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>类实现的相同的成员执行许多<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>; 这两个类之间的差异具有执行其预期与将放入总体内容模型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> derived class typically defines a relatively rigid content model, meaning that there are restrictions on what elements may be child elements in markup.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>派生的类通常定义相对较严格的内容模型，这意味着将对哪些元素可能会在标记中的子元素的限制。

trans-unit.source: There might be capacity for taking less restrictive child content in a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, but that capacity is typically centralized in designated content properties.
trans-unit.target: 可能有中采用限制性较弱的子内容的容量<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，但该容量通常集中在指定的内容属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived class is typically not as restrictive about content, to support scenarios such as flow-format documents.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>派生的类通常不是限制有关内容，以支持方案例如流格式的文档。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> state affects all input handling by that element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> 状态将影响处理由该元素的所有输入。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are not visible do not participate in hit testing and do not receive input events, even if the mouse is over the bounds where the element would be if were visible.
trans-unit.target: 不可见的元素不参与的命中测试和不接收输入的事件，即使鼠标位于边界元素将如果可见。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creating a new instance that is actually of type <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is uncommon in application code, because <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is a base element.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例的实际类型是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>通常在应用程序代码中，因为<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>是基元素。

trans-unit.source: See [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the routed event to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的路由事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 对处理程序实现的引用。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

trans-unit.source: You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 可以将同一事件的同一处理程序添加多次而不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该处理程序实际调用的多次处理该事件时。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请考虑如何此行为可能会产生的负面影响，应考虑在处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法来提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the routed event to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的路由事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 对处理程序实现的引用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to register the handler such that it is invoked even when the routed event is marked handled in its event data; <see langword="false" /> to register the handler with the default condition that it will not be invoked if the routed event is already marked handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将按以下方式注册处理程序：即使路由事件在其事件数据中标记为已处理，也会调用该处理程序；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使用默认条件注册处理程序，即当路由事件被标记为已处理时，将不调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not routinely ask to rehandle a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 请勿定期请求重新处理路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

trans-unit.source: Specify <paramref name="handledEventsToo" /> as <see langword="true" /> to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 将 <paramref name="handledEventsToo" /> 指定为 <see langword="true" />，可为已标记为由事件路由中的其他元素处理的路由事件调用所提供的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task.
trans-unit.target: 处理低级别的输入的事件中切实可行的方法是一个复杂的任务。

trans-unit.source: Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event.
trans-unit.target: 许多控件实现的行为其中特定事件被标记为已处理，而替换为另一个更直观的事件。

trans-unit.source: Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，控制为已处理某个设计意图要求这样做是否只是标注平台输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，这些设计意图可能不是你的输入事件的特定处理的要求。

trans-unit.source: It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 它为这些方案是该注册处理程序替换`handledEventsToo`作为`true`适合。

trans-unit.source: But you should not do this routinely.
trans-unit.target: 但你不应该这样做例行。

trans-unit.source: Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic.
trans-unit.target: 调用以响应所有事件处理程序，即使处理将使你自己的应用程序事件处理逻辑。

trans-unit.source: You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理程序逻辑是庞大，可能会看到导致性能降低。

trans-unit.source: You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic.
trans-unit.target: 你应保留使用附加的已处理事件的情况下，你已检测到在开发过程中，某些控件正在处理你仍想要使用应用程序逻辑处理的事件的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative.
trans-unit.target: 避免处理的某些事件控件组合的行为的类的另一种方法是使用该事件的预览版的替代项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>标记为已处理类处理，你可能能够为添加处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>相反。

trans-unit.source: You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 可以将同一事件的同一处理程序添加多次而不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该处理程序实际调用的多次处理该事件时。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请考虑如何此行为可能会产生的负面影响，应考虑在处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法来提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler invoked on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> event on a page that attaches a defined handler to one of the named elements on the page using `handledEventsToo` `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现一个处理程序调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>将定义处理程序附加到一个页面使用的命名元素的页面上的事件`handledEventsToo` `true`。

trans-unit.source: This handler would be invoked even if another element along the route marked the shared event data as handled before reaching the handling element in the route.
trans-unit.target: 将调用此处理程序，即使在路由过程的另一个元素标记为已处理之前已到达路线中的处理元素共享的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: The event route that handlers are added to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其添加处理程序的事件路由。

trans-unit.source: The event data that is used to add the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 用于添加处理程序的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> property of the event data to create the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用事件数据的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> 属性创建处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Adds handlers to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.EventRoute" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> event handler collection.
trans-unit.target: 将处理程序添加到当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.EventRoute" /> 事件处理程序集合的指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used by content host elements (either those that implement <xref:System.Windows.IContentHost> or those that don't) to add handlers for child elements to the <xref:System.Windows.EventRoute>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以由内容主机元素 (实现<xref:System.Windows.IContentHost>或那些不) 添加到的子元素的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.EventRoute>。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, this is not required for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, because handlers are automatically added for all elements found in a completed logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这不需要<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，这是因为处理程序会自动添加的已完成的逻辑树中找到的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: However, in some cases where <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are mixed in templated trees, intervening elements that came from the template need to be added to a route.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在某些情况下其中<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>模板树，干扰来自模板需要添加到路由的元素中混合。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> support a version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>支持此方法的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此元素能否用作拖放操作的目标。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素可用作拖放操作的目标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作默认情况下，不启用和必须通过设置有意启用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or any other base element class.
trans-unit.target: 除了此基本设置，拖放行为完全是特定的实现，并且未定义的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或任何其他类，该类。

trans-unit.source: Certain controls, for example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, do have a default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某些控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>，是否有一个默认行为。

trans-unit.source: For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 拖放的详细信息，请参阅[拖放概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> overrides the metadata for this dependency property in its implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 重写在其实现此依赖项属性的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> designates this property to allow property value inheritance (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A> is `true` in metadata).
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>指定此属性以允许属性值继承 (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>是`true`元数据中)。

trans-unit.source: Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop%2A> assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a local value), then the value from the parent element will be assigned to all previously unassigned child elements by the property system.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中的属性值继承意味着，如果有任何其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop%2A>通过本地值或样式，最接近的父元素的值与此值分配 （也是在样式，默认情况下分配值或本地值），则通过属性系统情况下，从父元素的值将分配给所有以前未分配的子元素。

trans-unit.source: In practice this means that you can specify whether to allow drop operations at the root element, and that value will propagate to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 实际上这意味着你可以指定是否在根元素中，允许拖放操作并且值将传播到所有子元素尚未专门为其分配`false`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following markup example sets the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop%2A> property `true` using an attribute on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, as well as setting some other related properties that in aggregate enable that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to be the target of a multiline text data object when it is dragged in.
trans-unit.target: 下面的标记示例设置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop%2A>属性`true`上使用属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>、 以及某些其他设置与相关的属性来聚合中实现这<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>将要目标的多行文本数据对象时拖动它。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Load a Dropped File Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be90d645-dd61-4f53-93bb-87902d086ef7).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的示例，请参阅[加载删除文件示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be90d645-dd61-4f53-93bb-87902d086ef7)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AllowDrop" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to a specified dependency property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 将动画应用到此元素的指定依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is sealed and cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是密封的，不能对其进行重写。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the property to animate.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The animation clock that controls and declares the animation.
trans-unit.target: 控制和声明动画的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to a specified dependency property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 将动画应用到此元素的指定依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: Any existing animations are stopped and replaced with the new animation.
trans-unit.target: 任何现有动画均停止并替换为新动画。

trans-unit.source: To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要从属性中移除动画，指定为该属性的标识符`dp`并指定`clock`作为`null`。

trans-unit.source: This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 这将删除动画和动画的属性设置为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时钟的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> `myAnimatedRectangle` has a particular timing animation applied to it by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ApplyAnimationClock%2A> .
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中， <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> `myAnimatedRectangle`已应用于它通过调用特定的计时动画<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ApplyAnimationClock%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The property to animate.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation clock that controls and declares the animation.
trans-unit.target: 控制和声明动画的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的一个值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />, which will stop any existing animation and replace with the new one.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />，这会停止任何现有动画并将其替换为新动画。

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to a specified dependency property on this element, with the ability to specify what happens if the property already has a running animation.
trans-unit.target: 向此元素的指定依赖属性应用动画，并且可以指定当该属性已有正在运行的动画时所要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要从属性中移除动画，指定为该属性的标识符`dp`并指定`clock`作为`null`。

trans-unit.source: This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 这将删除动画和动画的属性设置为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时钟的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素上是否至少捕获了一次触摸。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is captured to this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素上至少捕获了一次触摸，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesCaptured" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesCaptured" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is captured to this element or to any child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上是否至少捕获了一次触摸。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is captured to this element or any child elements in its visual tree; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上至少捕获了一次触摸，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesCapturedWithin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesCapturedWithin" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is pressed over this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素上是否至少按下了一次触摸设备。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is pressed over this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素上至少按下了一次触摸设备，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesDirectlyOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesDirectlyOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is pressed over this element or any child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上是否至少按下了一次触摸设备。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is pressed over this element or any child elements in its visual tree; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上至少按下了一次触摸设备，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.AreAnyTouchesOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The final size that the parent computes for the child element, provided as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 父元素为子元素计算的最终大小，表示为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Positions child elements and determines a size for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 定位子元素，并确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Parent elements call this method from their <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore(System.Windows.Rect)" /> implementation (or a WPF framework-level equivalent) to form a recursive layout update.
trans-unit.target: 父元素从它们的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore(System.Windows.Rect)" /> 实现（或者是 WPF 框架级别等效项）调用此方法，以便形成递归布局更新。

trans-unit.source: This method constitutes the second pass of a layout update.
trans-unit.target: 此方法产生第二次布局更新。

trans-unit.source: For WPF framework-level element deriving scenarios, behavior for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> should not (and cannot, unless you shadow) be changed.
trans-unit.target: 对于 WPF 框架级别元素派生方案，行为<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>更改不应 （而且不能除非使用阴影）。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should override the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> implementation in your class.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应重写<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>中你的类的实现。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> implementation is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> as part of default WPF framework-level layout operations.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>内部调用实现<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>作为默认 WPF 框架级别布局操作的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> implementation should also call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> on each child element, if it has child elements.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>实现还应调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>每个子元素，如果它包含子元素上。

trans-unit.source: For WPF core-level element deriving scenarios, the behavior for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> should not (and cannot, unless you shadow) be changed.
trans-unit.target: 对于 WPF 核心级元素派生方案的行为<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>更改不应 （而且不能除非使用阴影）。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> in your class.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>类中。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> implementation is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> as part of default WPF framework-level layout operations.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>内部调用实现<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>作为默认 WPF 框架级别布局操作的一部分。

trans-unit.source: However, this assumes you are using WPF framework-level layout and its layout system, which is often not the case if you are specifically deriving elements at the WPF core-level from the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> base element class.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这假定你在使用 WPF 框架级别布局和其布局系统，通常不是这种情况，如果你专门派生元素出现在 WPF 核心级别从<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>基类元素。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> implementation should also call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> on each child element, if it has child elements.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>实现还应调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>每个子元素，如果它包含子元素上。

trans-unit.source: Note that the WPF core-level scenario implies that you are not using a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class, because <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> seals <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，WPF 核心级方案意味着你不使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生类，因为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>密封<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Computation of WPF framework-level layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] consists of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call and an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 计算中的 WPF 框架级别布局定位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]组成<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>调用和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call, the layout system determines an element's size requirements using a provided <xref:System.Windows.Size> (`availableSize`) argument.
trans-unit.target: 期间<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>调用，该布局系统确定使用提供的元素的大小要求<xref:System.Windows.Size>(`availableSize`) 自变量。

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call, the layout system finalizes the size and position of an element's bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 期间<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用，该布局系统完成大小和元素的位置的边界框。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)。

trans-unit.source: `availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinity.
trans-unit.target: `availableSize` 可以是从零到无穷大任何数字。

trans-unit.source: Elements to be laid out return the minimum <xref:System.Windows.Size> they require through the `availableSize` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要进行布局的元素返回的最小<xref:System.Windows.Size>它们需要通过`availableSize`参数。

trans-unit.source: When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call before <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当首次实例化布局时，它始终会收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call without a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>; this can happen when a property that affects only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> without a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 但是后第一个布局处理过程，, 它可能会收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用而无需<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>; 这可能会在一个属性，仅影响<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>更改 （如对齐方式），或当父收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>而无需<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call will automatically invalidate an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>调用将自动使失效<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Layout updates generally occur asynchronously (at a time determined by the layout system).
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式 （一次由布局系统） 通常执行布局更新。

trans-unit.source: An element might not immediately reflect changes to properties that affect element sizing (such as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 元素可能不会立即反映对影响元素大小的属性的更改 (如<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Layout updates can be forced by using the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> method; however, calling this function is not recommended, as it is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过强制布局更新<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>方法; 但是，调用此函数不建议，因为它，通常没有必要，也可能会导致性能不佳。

trans-unit.source: In many situations where calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> might be appropriate, the layout system will probably already be processing updates.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>可能适合、 布局系统将可能已处理更新。

trans-unit.source: The layout system can process layout changes in a manner that can optimize all necessary updates as part of a package.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统可以处理可以优化作为包的一部分的所有必要的更新的方式的布局更改。

trans-unit.source: The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> and one for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统保留的一些无效的布局，一个用于两个单独的队列<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>，另一个用于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 布局队列根据可视化树中的元素的顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: Elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, in order to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents.
trans-unit.target: 元素树中较高级别的顶部，是队列的为了避免冗余布局父级中的重复更改所造成的。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already valid.
trans-unit.target: 从队列中，自动删除重复项，并且如果它们尚存在有效自动从队列删除元素。

trans-unit.source: When updating layout, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> queue is emptied first, followed by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> queue.
trans-unit.target: 更新布局时，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>队列为空首先后, 跟<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>队列。

trans-unit.source: An element in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> queue.
trans-unit.target: 中的某个元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>中的某个元素时，绝不会排列队列<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>队列。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that element should use to arrange itself and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 父级中应使用元素排列自身及其子元素的最终区域。

trans-unit.source: Defines the template for WPF core-level arrange layout definition.
trans-unit.target: 定义 WPF 核心级别排列布局定义的模板。

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method is only appropriate if you are deriving at the WPF core-level, and you are not using the WPF framework-level layout system and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class, because <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> seals <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法才适当派生在 WPF 核心级别，并且不使用 WPF 框架级别布局系统和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生类，因为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>密封<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the WPF framework-level layout system, the appropriate method to override for class-specific layout arrange behavior is <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的 WPF 框架级别布局系统，合适的方法来重写特定于类的布局的排列行为是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> implementations should call the base implementation to return a size, then call the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> method of each visible child element, and reconcile the sizes returned by these <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> calls with the size of the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> 实现应调用基实现来返回一个大小，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>方法的每个可见子元素，并将这些返回的大小对帐<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>大小为基实现的调用。

trans-unit.source: The logic for the reconciliation aspect of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> implementation might vary, depending on the layout characteristics of your element.
trans-unit.target: 对帐方面的逻辑<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>实现可能有所不同，具体取决于您的元素的布局特征。

trans-unit.source: In the following example template, `VisualChildren` is a hypothetical property that your element might define to help enumerate its content; <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not define content collections at this level, the WPF framework-level architecture defers content behavior to derived elements such as specific controls or control base classes.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例模板中，`VisualChildren`是您的元素可以定义来帮助枚举其内容，则假设属性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>不会定义内容的集合在此级别的 WPF 框架级别体系结构将推迟到派生的元素，如特定控件或控件的基类的内容行为。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing elements at the WPF core level,you should override this method to give your WPF core-level element a unique arrange layout behavior, or to make proper layout decisions about the child elements of your elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发的 WPF 核心级别处的元素，则应重写此方法，以便为您的 WPF 核心级元素唯一排列布局行为，或以正确的布局决策有关所选的元素的子元素。

trans-unit.source: An override might be necessary if those child elements are not recognizable from a defined pattern such as an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写可能有必要，如果这些子元素不可识别从定义的模式如<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A parent element must call the class-specific <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" /> on each child element, otherwise those child elements are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 父元素必须调用特定于类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange(System.Windows.Rect)" />上每个子元素，否则这些子元素不会呈现。

trans-unit.source: Starts an animation for a specified animated property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素的指定要进行动画处理的属性启动动画。

trans-unit.source: The property to animate, which is specified as a dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性，它被指定为依赖项属性标识符。

trans-unit.source: The timeline of the animation to start.
trans-unit.target: 要启动的动画的时间线。

trans-unit.source: Starts an animation for a specified animated property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素的指定要进行动画处理的属性启动动画。

trans-unit.source: When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 当你检查属性是否动画处理时，请注意动画将开始，并被视为非动画的起始点以外的第一帧呈现时进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>为`animation`是`null`，然后将删除当前的任何动画，并且保持的属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 如果整个`animation`值是`null`、 从属性中移除所有动画和属性值将恢复为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时间线。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时间线中的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an animation, assigns it, and then calls <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.BeginAnimation%2A> to start it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建动画、 其进行分配，并随后调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.BeginAnimation%2A>来启动它。

trans-unit.source: The property to animate, which is specified as the dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性，它被指定为依赖项属性标识符。

trans-unit.source: The timeline of the animation to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的动画的时间线。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that specifies how the new animation interacts with any current (running) animations that are already affecting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，用来指定新动画如何与已在影响属性值的任何当前（正在运行的）动画进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Starts a specific animation for a specified animated property on this element, with the option of specifying what happens if the property already has a running animation.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素的指定要进行动画处理的属性启动特定的动画，并可以指定当该属性已有正在运行的动画时所要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 当你检查属性是否动画处理时，请注意动画将开始，并被视为非动画的起始点以外的第一帧呈现时进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>为`animation`是`null`，然后将删除当前的任何动画，并且保持的属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 如果整个`animation`值是`null`、 从属性中移除所有动画和属性值将恢复为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时间线。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时间线中的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler that obtains an existing animation from a resource and then calls <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.BeginAnimation%2A> with a specified handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现一个处理程序以从资源，然后调用获取现有动画<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.BeginAnimation%2A>使用指定的提交行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a bitmap effect that applies directly to the rendered content for this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个位图效果，该效果将直接应用到此元素所呈现的内容。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap effect to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的位图效果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> is an abstract type, therefore the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage requires an implemented derived class of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> 是抽象类型，因此[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用法要求的已实现的派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>，如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect>。

trans-unit.source: Note that one implemented derived class is a collection type that allows you to specify more than one sequential <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>, using a nested tag syntax.
trans-unit.target: 请注意一个实现派生类是集合类型，，您可以指定多个顺序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>，使用嵌套的标记语法。

trans-unit.source: No existing derived class of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> supports a type converter, so the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax that you use for this property is generally property element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 没有现有的派生类<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>支持的类型转换器，因此[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用于此属性的语法通常是属性元素语法。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a bitmap effect, using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置的位图效果，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an input source for the bitmap effect that applies directly to the rendered content for this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位图效果的输入源，该效果将直接应用到此元素所呈现的内容。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The source for bitmap effects.
trans-unit.target: 位图效果的源。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.BitmapEffectInput" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.BitmapEffectInput" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.BitmapEffect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.BitmapEffect" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a cached representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的缓存表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" /> that holds a cached representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" />，用于容纳 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的缓存表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CacheMode%2A> property when you need to increase performance for content that is time consuming to render.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CacheMode%2A>属性时需要增加为长时间才能呈现程序内容的性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.CacheMode" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.CacheMode" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the mouse to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将鼠标强制捕获到此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕获了鼠标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be captured, an element must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Check whether <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> is `true` before you call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>是`true`之前调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A> returns `true`, then <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A> is also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A>返回`true`，然后<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A> returns `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCapturedChanged> events are raised, with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the event data reported as the element where the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A>返回`true`，则<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCapturedChanged>引发的事件，与<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在事件数据报告为元素其中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureMouse%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If you force capture, you might interfere with existing captures—especially with captures that relate to drag-and-drop with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制捕获时，你可能干扰现有捕获-尤其是在具有与拖放与鼠标相关的捕获。

trans-unit.source: To clear mouse capture from all elements, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the `element` parameter provided as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除从所有元素的鼠标捕获，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与`element`参数作为提供`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a pair of handlers for mouse and key input combination that capture (and uncapture) the mouse and enable a special mouse mode for viewing a 3D model.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现一对用于鼠标和键的输入的组合，将鼠标捕获 （和取消捕获） 的处理程序，并启用一种用于查看三维模型的特殊鼠标模式。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将触笔强制捕获到此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus was successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕获了触笔，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation based on the underlying default stylus device always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 始终根据基础默认触笔设备的默认实现返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are extending the input devices that provide the device implementation for the input system, it is possible to create a system with an alternative stylus device implementation that might return different results.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你要扩展提供在输入系统的设备实现的输入的设备，则可能与一个备用的触笔设备实现，可能会返回不同的结果中创建系统。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the stylus is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使触笔超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常，将触笔捕获仅在拖放操作过程。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method calls an underlying static <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus> method <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法调用基础静态<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The actual capture behavior is implemented by the active stylus device implementation.
trans-unit.target: 由活动的触笔设备实现实现实际捕获行为。

trans-unit.source: To be captured, an element must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Check whether <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> is `true` return before you call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureStylus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>是`true`返回你在调用之前<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureStylus%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureStylus%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A> is also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureStylus%2A>返回`true`，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: The device to capture.
trans-unit.target: 要捕获的设备。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of a touch to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将触摸屏输入强制捕获到此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified touch is captured to this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将指定触摸屏输入捕获到此元素，则为 <see langword="true" /> ；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureTouch%2A> will return `false` if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is currently captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureTouch%2A> 将返回`false`如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>当前捕获到另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureTouch%2A> returns `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotTouchCapture> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CaptureTouch%2A>返回`true`，则<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotTouchCapture>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: To release capture of a single touch from this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ReleaseTouchCapture%2A> method and specify the touch device to release.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放的单个触摸从此元素的捕获，请使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ReleaseTouchCapture%2A>方法并指定要释放的触摸设备。

trans-unit.source: To release all touches from this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ReleaseAllTouchCaptures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放所有触摸从此元素，请使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ReleaseAllTouchCaptures%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="touchDevice" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="touchDevice" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the geometry used to define the outline of the contents of an element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于定义元素内容轮廓的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to be used for clipping area sizing.
trans-unit.target: 用于剪裁区域大小的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: Elements outside the geometry will be visually clipped in the rendered layout.
trans-unit.target: 将呈现布局中以可视方式剪辑几何图形外部的元素。

trans-unit.source: The geometry does not have to be rectangular.
trans-unit.target: 几何图形不必是矩形。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to define a framework element's <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> region.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何定义框架元素的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A>区域。

trans-unit.source: To define a clip, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> (for example, an <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> to set the element's <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义一个剪辑，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>(例如，<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>设置元素的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Only the area that is within the region of the geometry will be visible.
trans-unit.target: 仅位于的几何图形的区域内的区域将可见。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> element without a defined clip region.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>没有定义的剪辑区域元素。

trans-unit.source: Because no clip region is defined, the entire image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 由于定义没有剪辑区域，则将显示整个图像。

trans-unit.source: ![An object before applying a clip region](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-noclip.png "An object before applying a clip region")
trans-unit.target: ![应用剪辑区域之前的对象](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-noclip.png "之前应用剪辑区域的对象")

trans-unit.source: Image with No Clip Region
trans-unit.target: 没有剪辑区域的图像

trans-unit.source: In the next example, an identical Image is created, except that it has a defined clip region.
trans-unit.target: 在下一步的示例中，创建相同的映像，只不过它具有定义的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: Only the part of the image that is within the area the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 只有在区域内的映像的部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>将显示。

trans-unit.source: ![A clipped object](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-ellispe.PNG "A clipped object")
trans-unit.target: ![经过剪辑的对象](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-ellispe.PNG "经过剪辑的对象")

trans-unit.source: Image with an Elliptical Clip Region
trans-unit.target: 椭圆的剪辑区域与映像

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how animate a framework element's <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> region.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何动态显示的 framework 元素的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A>区域。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> is used to define an elliptical clip region for an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> element.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry>用于定义的椭圆的剪辑区域<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimation> animates the ellipse geometry's <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center%2A> property from (0, 0) to (200, 150).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimation>进行动画处理的椭圆几何图形<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center%2A>从属性 （0，0） 到 （200，150）。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts playing after the image is loaded and repeats indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 此动画开始播放后图像加载，并且无限期地重复。

trans-unit.source: For the full sample, see the [Clip Region Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83043a0b-f824-445f-9675-103280c5ca67).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅[剪辑区域示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83043a0b-f824-445f-9675-103280c5ca67)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to clip the content of this element (or content coming from the child elements of this element) to fit into the size of the containing element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否剪切此元素的内容(或来自此元素的子元素的内容)使其适合包含元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content should be clipped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应剪切内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For child elements, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> has different effects on layout behaviors depending on whether the height and width of the parent element are being determined by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 子元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>有不同的效果，具体取决于是否的高度和宽度的父元素由所决定的布局行为<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A> of the parent element are always respected regardless of the value of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> and the effective clipping will always clip the content based on these maximums.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A> 无论的值始终遵循的父元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>和有效剪辑始终将剪切内容内容根据这些最大值。

trans-unit.source: The parent's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> settings will not clip the content when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> is `false`, but will clip the content if <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 父级<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> / <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>设置不会剪裁内容时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>是`false`，但将剪切内容如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Note that defaulting to `false` is the general behavior as implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，默认为`false`是常规行为，在中实现<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for any given element that derives from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to override the dependency property metadata for this property in that instance to default to `true` instead.
trans-unit.target: 它是派生自任何给定元素可能<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>重写此属性默认为该实例中的依赖项属性元数据`true`相反。

trans-unit.source: Several existing derived classes override this metadata and/or adjust the dependency property default value.
trans-unit.target: 多个现有的派生的类重写此元数据和/或调整依赖项属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> each override the default value to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas><xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>每个重写此默认值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> overrides the metadata for this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 重写此依赖项属性的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> designates this property to allow property value inheritance (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A> is `true` in metadata).
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>指定此属性以允许属性值继承 (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>是`true`元数据中)。

trans-unit.source: Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a locally value), then the value from the parent element will be assigned to all unassigned child elements by the property system.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中的属性值继承意味着，如果有任何其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>通过本地值或样式，最接近的父元素的值与此值分配 （也是在样式，默认情况下分配值，或本地值)，则通过属性系统情况下，从父元素的值将分配给所有未分配的子元素。

trans-unit.source: In practice this means that you can specify whether to allow clip to bounds at the root element, and that value will propagate to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 实际上这意味着你可以指定是否允许剪切到边界在根元素中，并且值将传播到所有子元素尚未专门为其分配`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> objects associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此元素关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> enables command handling for this element, and declares the linkage between a command, its events, and the handlers attached by this element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 为此元素启用命令处理，并声明命令、命令的事件和由此元素附加的处理程序之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 所有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Another typical way to populate the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A> collection is to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> methods programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 另一种典型的方法来填充<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A>集合是使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>方法以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreCommandBindings*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreCommandBindings*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>元素。

trans-unit.source: Each of these should have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Command%2A> attribute set to a known command, and attributes set for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> handler implementations.
trans-unit.target: 每个都应当有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Command%2A>属性设置为所知的命令，并且属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>。

trans-unit.source: The following example does essentially the same thing in code:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例执行的代码中实质上是相同的操作：

trans-unit.source: Gets the size that this element computed during the measure pass of the layout process.
trans-unit.target: 获取在布局流程的度量传递过程中此元素计算所得的大小。

trans-unit.source: The computed size, which becomes the desired size for the arrange pass.
trans-unit.target: 计算所得大小，它将成为排列过程所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property will only be a valid measurement if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMeasureValid%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 返回此属性的值才有效的度量值的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMeasureValid%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> is typically checked as one of the measurement factors when you implement layout behavior overrides such as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A> (in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A> case, you might check <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A> instead, but this depends on your implementation).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> 通常已选中，因为其中一个度量因素时实现布局行为如覆盖<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A>(在<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A>种情况下，您可以检查<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>相反，但这取决于你实现）。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the scenario, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> might be fully respected by your implementation logic, constraints on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> might be applied, and such constraints might also change other characteristics of either the parent element or child element.
trans-unit.target: 根据方案，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>可能会完全遵循你实现逻辑，约束上<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>可能会应用，而此类约束也可能更改该父元素或子元素的其他特征。

trans-unit.source: For example, a control that supports scrollable regions (but chooses not to derive from the WPF framework-level controls that already enable scrollable regions) could compare available size to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，支持可滚动区域 （但选择不从已启用可滚动区域的 WPF 框架级别控件派生） 的控件无法比较可用大小与<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The control could then set an internal state that enabled scrollbars in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for that control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该控件可以设置启用中的滚动条的内部状态[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]该控件。

trans-unit.source: Or, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> could potentially also be ignored in certain scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 或者，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>可能还在某些方案中被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>作为的一部分<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>实现。

trans-unit.source: Notice how <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called immediately prior to obtaining <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意如何<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>获取之前调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This assures that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A> holds a legitimate value.
trans-unit.target: 这可以确保<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize%2A>保存合法值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag target.

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the potential drop target.
trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现以此元素为可能放置目标的基础拖动事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs even if the drag originates in the element bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果即使拖动源自于元素边界，则会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If the drag starts outside the bounds and then moves inside, this event is also raised, as well as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter> and related preview events.
trans-unit.target: 如果拖动的范围之外启动，然后将移动内，也会引发此事件，以及<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter>和相关预览事件。

trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bitmap effect to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的位图效果。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" /> that represents the bitmap effect.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示位图效果的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Effect%2A> property to apply a bitmap effect to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Effect%2A>属性，将应用到一个位图效果效果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段
