trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following XAML shows how to assign a custom <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Effect%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 XAML 演示如何分配自定义<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Effect%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Effect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Effect" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to set focus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将焦点设定到此元素上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus and logical focus were set to this element; <see langword="false" /> if only logical focus was set to this element, or if the call to this method did not force the focus to change.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘焦点和逻辑焦点同时设定到此元素上，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果只有逻辑焦点设定到此元素上或此方法调用未强制更改焦点，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be focusable, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> must both be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 可获得焦点，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>必须都是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 即使元素是特定的树中的焦点并已启用，事件处理，（例如，用于复合控件） 可能会响应预览焦点事件通过不允许焦点，因此此方法将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical.
trans-unit.target: 焦点通常由两个不同的概念： 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点，并不总是相同。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md) or [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)或[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>返回`true`，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>, one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> (source is the new focus target), <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> (source is the new focus target).
trans-unit.target: 如果相关的属性不是已`true`，则在调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>，一个或多个以下事件将按照以下顺序引发： <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> （来源为新的焦点目标）， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> （来源为新的焦点目标）。

trans-unit.source: In order for this call to be successful, some other element in the application needed to have focus previously.
trans-unit.target: 在此调用会成功，需以前就具有焦点的应用程序中的某些其他元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets focus to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> referenced by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>, and then adjusts the position of the cursor within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将焦点设置到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>所引用的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>，然后调整中光标的位置和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示元素能否得到焦点。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is focusable; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素可获得焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Only the focused element receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 具有焦点的元素收到键盘输入。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]它实际上是依赖项属性的属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes, particularly in controls.
trans-unit.target: 此特定的依赖项属性非常普遍地具有派生的元素类，尤其是在控件中以不同方式设置其原本"默认"值。

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs in one of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 这通常发生在两种方式之一：

trans-unit.source: The dependency property is inherited by a particular derived class, but that derived class overrides the metadata of the dependency property and changes the property default value.
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性继承的特定派生类中，但该派生类重写依赖项属性的元数据，更改属性默认值。

trans-unit.source: A style or template is applied to an element, which sets that dependency property value differently.
trans-unit.target: 样式或模板应用到元素，从而以不同方式设置的依赖项属性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the apparent "default" of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control will be `true`, even though <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> inherits <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property directly from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，明显"默认"的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控件将是`true`，即使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>继承<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]直接从属性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: This is because the applied metadata value for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> dependency property was overridden within the static constructor of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> base class, which is situated between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in the class hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为应用的元数据值，则为<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>依赖项属性已被重写中的静态构造函数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>基类，该基类位于之间<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>类层次结构中。

trans-unit.source: When inherited by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> or its derived classes, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> redefines the default value of this property to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>或其派生的类，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>重新定义为此属性的默认值`true`。

trans-unit.source: When inherited by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> (which is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> derived class), the default value is again redefined to be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>(即<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>派生类)，默认值再次重新定义为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example code illustrates a control template for a particular custom control, which sets <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> `false` on one of the elements within the template.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示用于特定的自定义控件，设置控件模板<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>`false`其中一个模板内的元素上。

trans-unit.source: When deriving from <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> directly (as opposed to from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" />), consider whether you wish your element to be focusable, because by default the element will not be focusable.
trans-unit.target: 从派生时<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />直接 (而不是从<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" />)，应考虑是否希望您可获得焦点，因为默认情况下该元素将不能获得焦点的元素。

trans-unit.source: If you wish your element to be focusable, override the metadata for this property within your type's static constructor as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使元素可获得焦点，重写此属性类型的静态构造函数中的元数据，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: where <paramref name="myElement" /> should be the class name of the type that you are overriding the metadata value on.
trans-unit.target: 其中<paramref name="myElement" />应该重写元数据值的类型的类名称。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The dependency property to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the base property value for the specified property on this element, disregarding any possible animated value from a running or stopped animation.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素上的指定属性返回基属性值，忽略任何可能来自正在运行或已停止的动画的动画值。

trans-unit.source: The property value as if no animations are attached to the specified dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 就像没有动画被附加到指定的依赖属性一样的属性值。

trans-unit.source: If no animations are attached to the property, then the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetAnimationBaseValue%2A> return value is always identical to the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有动画被附加到属性，则<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GetAnimationBaseValue%2A>返回值也始终等于<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>返回值。

trans-unit.source: If there are animations attached, then all possible animation derived values including the start and stop values are ignored, and the property value is determined based on all other possible inputs.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有附加的动画，然后所有可能的动画派生值包括开始和停止值将被忽略，并确定基于所有其他可能的输入属性值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler that reports the base value of an animated <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, as well as the base value of a transform.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现的处理程序报告的动画的基础价值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，以及转换的基础价值。

trans-unit.source: The available size provided by the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素提供的可用大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns an alternative clipping geometry that represents the region that would be clipped if <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds" /> were set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回另外一个剪辑几何图形，该图形表示当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds" /> 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 时将被剪辑的区域。

trans-unit.source: The potential clipping geometry.
trans-unit.target: 可能的剪辑几何图形。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a legitimate value, but does not use the `layoutSlotSize` parameter in its calculations.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将返回合法的值，但不使用`layoutSlotSize`其计算中的参数。

trans-unit.source: Instead it uses the value of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 而是使用的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is substantially overridden by the immediately derived <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> class, and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> override produces a more sophisticated behavior for general WPF framework-level elements.
trans-unit.target: 大体上重写此方法直接派生的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>类，与<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>替代生成的常规的 WPF 框架级别元素更为复杂的行为。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetLayoutClip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an alternative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] parent for this element if no visual parent exists.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，如果不存在可视父级，则返回其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 父级。

trans-unit.source: An object, if implementation of a derived class has an alternate parent connection to report.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生类的实现具有要报告的替代父级连接，则为一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认虚拟实现返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> provides a practical implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 提供实际实现。

trans-unit.source: Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: 备用父级是用于路由事件，在其中元素创建备用父级结构，以便其事件路由偏离到标准的父级的可视化树向上路由的标准模式的方式的情况下或向下预览路由策略。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag-and-drop event that involves this element.
trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现涉及此元素的基础拖放操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback>事件允许拖动事件，以便为用户可视反馈提供拖放操作期间修改鼠标指针的外观的源。

trans-unit.source: The visual feedback reinforces that a drag-and-drop operation is in process.
trans-unit.target: 视觉反馈用于强调拖放操作正在进行。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 冒泡

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGiveFeedback>.
trans-unit.target: 对应的隧道事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGiveFeedback>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnGiveFeedback%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnGiveFeedback%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GiveFeedback" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素获得逻辑焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A> method is called still gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，键盘焦点将保持其所在的元素的和其中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>调用方法仍获取逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A>路线中的元素的属性更改从`false`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，接收到焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素聚焦于键盘时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event is raised in many of the same circumstances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> 是一个类似事件，跟踪中维护的一个元素; 的焦点状态的属性的状态更改<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>在很多相同的情况下引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定实际具有焦点的元素中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素捕获鼠标时发生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在鼠标指针位于超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获，并且将保持捕获，直到发生拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>在事件数据以确定实际的元素具有鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element captures the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素捕获触笔时发生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使在指针位于超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 触笔通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获和捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has capture.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定已捕获的实际元素中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has any animated properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素是否具有任何进行动画处理的属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has animations attached to any of its properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有附加到其任何属性的动画，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` either for persistent (unclocked, always-running) animations, or for animations that have a specific timeline.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`为永久性 （无时间限制，始终运行） 动画，或具有特定的时间线的动画。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 是否具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> has focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 具有焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses can override this property to specify when the element has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 子类可以重写此属性指定当此元素具有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when your <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> contains elements that can have keyboard focus and you want your element to report that it has focus.
trans-unit.target: 这是有用时你<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>包含可将键盘焦点的元素，并且你希望你报告其具有焦点的元素。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters)" /> to supply base element hit testing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters)" /> 以提供基元素命中测试行为。

trans-unit.source: Describes the hit test to perform, including the initial hit point.
trans-unit.target: 描述要执行的命中测试，包括初始命中点。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters)" /> to supply base element hit testing behavior (returning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult" />).
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters)" /> 以提供基元素命中测试行为（返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult" />）。

trans-unit.source: Results of the test, including the evaluated geometry.
trans-unit.target: 测试结果，包括计算的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: See the original virtual method <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for information on overriding this method in further derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅原始虚拟方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>信息进一步重写此方法在派生类的。

trans-unit.source: Note that several specific controls (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, for example) do have distinct implementations, which override this one.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，几个特定控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>，例如) 是否具有不同的实现，重写此。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from your application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从你的应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: This method supports internal hit testing behaviors that are exposed by various aspects of the input system (whether the mouse pointer is over an element, for example).
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持内部 （鼠标指针是否为通过元素，例如） 公开的输入的系统的各个方面的命中测试行为。

trans-unit.source: Describes the hit test to perform, including the initial hit point.
trans-unit.target: 描述要执行的命中测试，包括初始命中点。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters)" /> to supply base element hit testing behavior (returning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" />).
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore(System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters)" /> 以提供基元素命中测试行为（返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" />）。

trans-unit.source: Results of the test, including the evaluated point.
trans-unit.target: 包括计算的点的测试结果。

trans-unit.source: See the original virtual method <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for information on overriding this method in further derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅原始虚拟方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.HitTestCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>信息进一步重写此方法在派生类的。

trans-unit.source: Note that several specific controls (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, for example) do have distinct implementations, which override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.HitTestCore%2A> as defined by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，几个特定控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>，例如) 是否具有不同的实现，重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.HitTestCore%2A>由定义<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from your application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从你的应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: This method supports internal hit testing behaviors that are exposed by various aspects of the input system (whether the mouse pointer is over an element, for example).
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持内部 （鼠标指针是否为通过元素，例如） 公开的输入的系统的各个方面的命中测试行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of input bindings associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此元素关联的输入绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input bindings.
trans-unit.target: 输入绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices.
trans-unit.target: 输入的绑定支持命令来输入设备的绑定。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> implements input bindings that include properties that are particular to mouse devices.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>实现的输入包括特定于鼠标设备的属性的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input bindings will include both input bindings that pertain to the type as well as input bindings that are declared on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 适用于类型的输入的绑定以及输入声明的实例的绑定，将包括的输入绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: A related property, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A>, maintains a collection of command bindings.
trans-unit.target: 相关的属性， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A>，保持命令绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: These differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands.
trans-unit.target: 这些不同于输入绑定，因为它们表示下一个级别的命令处理的操作依赖于已知的命令。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreInputBindings*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreInputBindings*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> elements (typically the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> derived classes).
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>元素 (通常<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>派生类)。

trans-unit.source: Each of these is expected to have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 其中每个都应<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The following example populates this property on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, with a single <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例填充此属性上<xref:System.Windows.Window>，与单个<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for collections, see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法的集合，请参见[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。

trans-unit.source: The offset coordinates within this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素中的偏移坐标。

trans-unit.source: Returns the input element within the current element that is at the specified coordinates, relative to the current element's origin.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定坐标上的当前元素中的输入元素（相对于当前元素的源）。

trans-unit.source: The element child that is located at the given position.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定位置的子元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> is returned as the return type, because that type is a common interface for both <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> 返回作为返回类型，因为该类型是一个通用界面执行同时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: You can then cast the return type appropriately, or use the interface instance for certain members that are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以相应地，强制转换返回类型或接口实例用于定义的某些成员<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>接口。

trans-unit.source: This method typically is not called from your application code.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码中通常不调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only appropriate if you intend to re-implement a substantial amount of the low level input features that are already present, such as recreating mouse device logic.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法仅是如果你想要重新实现大量的较低级别的输入功能已提供，如重新创建鼠标设备逻辑的适当的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.IContentHost> contracts an <xref:System.Windows.IContentHost.InputHitTest%2A> method with the same signature, which some elements choose to implement explicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.IContentHost> 协定<xref:System.Windows.IContentHost.InputHitTest%2A>具有相同签名，某些元素选择以显式实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the arrange state (layout) for the element.
trans-unit.target: 使元素排列状态（布局）无效。

trans-unit.source: After the invalidation, the element will have its layout updated, which will occur asynchronously unless subsequently forced by <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout" />.
trans-unit.target: 使其无效后，将会更新元素的布局，除非随后被 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout" /> 强制执行，否则该更新将会异步发生。

trans-unit.source: Frequent calls to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A> or in particular to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> have significant performance consequences.
trans-unit.target: 频繁调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A>或在特定于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>具有显著的性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, avoid calling this method unless you absolutely require precise layout state for subsequent calls to other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，避免调用此方法，除非绝对需要精确布局状态以便后续调用其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]在代码中。

trans-unit.source: An advanced scenario where you might call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A> is if you are creating a <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> for a dependency property that is not on a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class that still influences the arrange pass of layout when it changes.
trans-unit.target: 高级的方案中可能会在其中调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A>是如果您创建<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>用于不在的依赖项属性<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生时，它将更改仍然影响布局的排列处理的类。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the measurement state (layout) for the element.
trans-unit.target: 使元素度量状态（布局）无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also calls <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A> internally, there is no need to call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateMeasure%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A> in succession.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法还调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A>内部，没有无需调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateMeasure%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A>连续。

trans-unit.source: After the invalidation, the element will have its layout updated, which will occur asynchronously, unless <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> is called to force a synchronous layout change.
trans-unit.target: 使无效后，该元素将更新，则会出现以异步方式，除非其布局<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>调用以强制进行同步的布局更改。

trans-unit.source: The WPF framework-level layout system does its own handling of changes in the visual tree of an element, and in most common layout invalidation cases the layout system is calling the equivalent of this method when necessary.
trans-unit.target: WPF 框架级别布局系统进行的更改在可视化树中的元素，其自己处理和在最常见布局失效的情况下该布局系统时调用此方法在必要时等效。

trans-unit.source: You should only call this method if you are producing a complete layout implementation, which does direct manipulation of the element tree, or similar advanced scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果你生成完整的布局实现，直接操作元素树中，或类似高级方案，仅应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: One such advanced scenario is if you are creating a <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> for a dependency property that is not on a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class that still influences the measure pass of layout when it changes.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种高级的方案是如果您创建<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>用于不在的依赖项属性<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生类时，它将更改仍然影响布局的测量过程。

trans-unit.source: Frequent calls to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateMeasure%2A> or in particular to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> have significant performance consequences.
trans-unit.target: 频繁调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateMeasure%2A>或在特定于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>具有显著的性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, avoid calling this method unless you absolutely require precise layout state for subsequent calls to other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，避免调用此方法，除非绝对需要精确布局状态以便后续调用其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]在代码中。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the rendering of the element, and forces a complete new layout pass.
trans-unit.target: 使元素的呈现失效，并强制执行完整的新布局处理过程。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender(System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext)" /> is called after the layout cycle is completed.
trans-unit.target: 布局循环完成后，调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender(System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A> internally.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A>内部。

trans-unit.source: This method is not generally called from your application code.
trans-unit.target: 通常从你的应用程序代码不调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The WPF framework-level layout system does its own handling of changes in the visual tree of an element, and would be calling the equivalent of this method when necessary already.
trans-unit.target: WPF 框架级别布局系统进行的更改在可视化树中的元素，其自己处理，并会在必要时此方法等效于在调用已。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is necessary only for advanced scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法是仅适用于高级方案必需的。

trans-unit.source: One such advanced scenario is if you are creating a <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> for a dependency property that is not on a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class that still influences the layout when it changes.
trans-unit.target: 其中一种高级的方案是如果您创建<xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback>用于不在的依赖项属性<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生时，它将更改仍然影响布局的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the computed size and position of child elements in this element's layout are valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素布局中的子元素的计算大小和位置是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the size and position of layout are valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果布局的大小和位置都有效，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can force arrangement to be invalidated by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A> on this element (or its parents).
trans-unit.target: 你可以强制排列方式，可以通过调用失效<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateArrange%2A>对此元素 （或其父级）。

trans-unit.source: This flags the layout for recomposition at such time as the layout system determines.
trans-unit.target: 在布局系统确定如次时，此标志重新组合的布局。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, an immediate call to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> could be made, but this should only be done if it is certain that no further invalidations are pending (a large number of unnecessarily forced updates has performance consequences).
trans-unit.target: 或者，直接调用到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>无法进行，但这只应该在确定，没有其他挂起的挂起 （大量不必要的强制更新具有性能产生负面影响）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsArrangeValid%2A> cannot be `true` unless <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMeasureValid%2A> is also `true` (in the layout process, arrangement cannot be valid without measurement first being valid).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsArrangeValid%2A> 不能为`true`除非<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMeasureValid%2A>也`true`（在布局过程中，排列方式不能有效而无需首先被有效的度量）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this element is enabled in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中启用了此元素。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了该元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is influenced by class-specific implementations of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabledCore%2A> on particular elements, often at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性会影响的类特定于实现<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabledCore%2A>对于特定的元素，通常在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the default value listed here is sometimes not effective.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此处列出的默认值有时不是有效。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> will be <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> `false` whenever it is determined that there is no need to support a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>将<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>`false`每当确定是否有不需要支持滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set this value will also potentially be overridden by the value returned by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabledCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 正在尝试设置此值将也有可能被替代返回的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabledCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are not enabled do not participate in hit testing or focus and therefore will not be sources of input events.
trans-unit.target: 未启用的元素不参与命中测试或获得焦点，并因此将不会输入事件的源。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler on one button that when executed will set <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> `false` on another named button `b1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一个处理程序，一个按钮上，执行的将设置时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>`false`上另一个命名按钮`b1`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" /> property on this element changes.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that becomes the return value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" /> in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值成为派生类中 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" /> 的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了该元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property caches the value and also calculates whether the parent element of this element is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认实现缓存的值，并还计算是否启用此元素的父元素。

trans-unit.source: (If the parent is not enabled, the child element cannot be effectively enabled in practical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].) If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base implementation to preserve this behavior.
trans-unit.target: (如果未启用父，子元素不能有效地启用中实际[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。)如果你选择重写此实现，请确保调用基实现来保留此行为。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> class provides an existing override implementation of this property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />类提供了此属性的现有重写实现。

trans-unit.source: This override determines whether the content inside the content presentation area exceeds the available area.
trans-unit.target: 此替代确定内容呈现区域中的内容是否超出了可用的区域。

trans-unit.source: If the content does exceed the area, the scrollbar portion is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容超出区域，则启用的滚动条部分。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the scrollbar is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不启用滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this element has logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定此元素是否具有逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has logical focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有逻辑焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序中有多个焦点分支，例如，菜单的内容和应用程序的其余部分之间，逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点可能会与不同。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，键盘焦点仅可在应用程序 UI 的一个元素，但是，其他焦点分支中的某些元素仍可能保留逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: For more information on logical focus, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You do not set focus by setting this property (it is read-only).
trans-unit.target: 通过设置此属性 （它是只读的） 未设置焦点。

trans-unit.source: The typical use for this property is to use it as a dependency property for a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> or <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的典型用途是将其用作依赖项属性的<xref:System.Windows.Setter>或<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>。

trans-unit.source: To set focus programmatically, call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式设置焦点，请调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Focus can also be set by user action or by control implementations, which possibly include mouse capture behavior.
trans-unit.target: 由用户操作或控件实现，其中可能包括鼠标捕获行为，则还可以设置焦点。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example is a code handler that changes the background of a control when it is focused.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是当它已设定焦点时，更改控件的背景的代码处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Another common way to achieve this same effect is to place a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> in the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a control; this approach does not require handling specific events with code-behind and allows designers greater access to the interactive and graphical nature of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 另一种常见的方法来实现此相同的效果是将<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>中<xref:System.Windows.Style>的控件，则此方法不需要处理与隐藏代码的特定事件，并允许更大的交互式和图形性质访问的设计器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Create an Outer Glow Effect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a2ccf19a-d0dc-4e3c-88e3-95d7f7d765b1).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 创建外部的发光效果](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a2ccf19a-d0dc-4e3c-88e3-95d7f7d765b1)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that declares whether this element can possibly be returned as a hit test result from some portion of its rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值声明是否可以返回此元素作为其呈现内容的某些部分的点击测试结果。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element could be returned as a hit test result from at least one point; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素可以从至少一个点上作为命中测试结果返回，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The effective value of this property is influenced by the relative positions of hit testable elements in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的有效值受命中可测试的元素的逻辑树中的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if an element is a child element of an element that is not hit test visible, the effective value of the property on the child will remain `false`, even if attempting to set that value locally.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个元素的子元素的元素将是不会命中测试可见，对子属性的有效值将保持`false`，即使尝试本地设置该值。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, it is important that you do not set <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsHitTestVisible%2A> to `false` on a composited control unless you do not want any input or hit testing on that control.
trans-unit.target: 为此，务必不要设置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsHitTestVisible%2A>到`false`复合控件除非你不需要任何输入或命中测试该控件上。

trans-unit.source: For more information on hit testing, see [Hit Testing in the Visual Layer](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关命中测试的详细信息，请参阅[可视化层中的命中测试](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an input method system, such as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)], is enabled for processing the input to this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用一个输入法系统（如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)]），以便用于处理此元素的输入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an input method is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入法处于活动状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the underlying attached property is <see langword="true;" /> however, this will be influenced by the actual state of input methods at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 基础附加属性的默认值是<see langword="true;" />但是，这会受到输入法在运行时的实际状态。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value that is returned by the attached property <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the currently enabled input methods (keyboard, speech, and other input devices).
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的附加属性返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的当前已启用输入法 （键盘、 语音和其他输入的设备）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示该元素是否具有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有键盘焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the determined value of this property may be accompanied by focus-related events.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性的确定值可能伴随与焦点相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are commonly used within class event handlers for other input-related events, for instance to determine whether the element already has keyboard focus, or to make determinations when mouse events and keyboard events occur in conjunction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>通常用于在类事件处理程序内其他输入相关的事件，例如以确定此元素已具有键盘焦点，还是进行确定当鼠标事件和键盘事件一起出现。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether keyboard focus is anywhere within the element or its visual tree child elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示键盘焦点是否位于元素或其可视化树子元素内的任意位置。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus is on the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘焦点在元素或其子元素上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the value of this property typically raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> event, unless a derived class has overridden <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged%2A> to suppress the event.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性的值通常引发<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>事件，除非派生的类已重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged%2A>以禁止此事件。

trans-unit.source: You do not set this property directly, but you can set the focus to an element by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>, or by making a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A> request.
trans-unit.target: 不能直接，设置此属性，但你可以通过调用将焦点设置到的元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>，或通过使<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MoveFocus%2A>请求。

trans-unit.source: Either of these method calls might change this property value.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法调用任一可能会更改此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are typically used within class event handlers for other input-related events, for instance to determine whether the element already has keyboard focus, or to make determinations when mouse events and keyboard events occur in conjunction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>通常用于在类事件处理程序内其他输入相关的事件，例如以确定此元素已具有键盘焦点，还是进行确定当鼠标事件和键盘事件一起出现。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether manipulation events are enabled on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 启用操作事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if manipulation events are enabled on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 启用操作事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to true if you want the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to receive the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性设置为 true，如果你想<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>接收<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarted>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback>，和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an application that has a red Rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建具有红色矩形的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled%2A> property of the Rectangle is set to true and the application's window subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled%2A>的矩形的属性设置为 true，应用程序的窗口订阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>，和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current size returned by layout measure is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示布局测量返回的当前大小是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the measure pass of layout returned a valid and current value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果布局的测量处理过程返回一个有效的当前值，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can force measurement and arrangement to be invalidated by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateMeasure%2A> on this element (or any parent element up the visual tree).
trans-unit.target: 你可以强制测量和排列可以通过调用失效<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateMeasure%2A>对此元素 （或上的可视化树的任何父元素）。

trans-unit.source: This designates the layout for recomposition asynchronously, occurring at a time determined by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 这将指定以进行重新组合布局以异步方式发生由布局系统一次。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you could make an immediate call to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以进行直接调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, you should only call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> if it is likely that no further invalidations are pending (a large number of unnecessarily forced updates will have performance consequences).
trans-unit.target: 但是，你应只调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>如果则很可能，没有其他挂起的挂起 （大量不必要的强制更新将产生性能后果）。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMeasureValid%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsArrangeValid%2A> must also be `false` (by the enforced logic of the layout process, arrangement cannot be valid without measurement first being valid).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMeasureValid%2A>是`false`，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsArrangeValid%2A>还必须是`false`（由在布局流程的强制执行逻辑，排列方式不能有效而无需首先被有效的度量）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素是否捕获了鼠标。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has mouse capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有鼠标捕获，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mouse capture state is related to in-process drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标捕获状态与相关进程内拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example turns the mouse capture state on or off based on whether the mouse is already captured for the element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例打开鼠标捕获状态或关闭基于元素是否已捕获鼠标。

trans-unit.source: If mouse capture is elsewhere, the mouse capture is set to that element.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标捕获是在其他位置，鼠标捕获设置为该元素。

trans-unit.source: If the element had mouse capture, it is cleared by calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with a null input.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有鼠标捕获，它通过调用清除<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用 null 输入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether mouse capture is held by this element or by child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定鼠标捕获是由此元素还是其可视化树中的子元素持有。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element or a contained element has mouse capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素或其包含的元素具有鼠标捕获，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="F:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptureWithinProperty" /> changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptureWithinProperty" /> 值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptureWithin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptureWithin" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the position of the mouse pointer corresponds to hit test results, which take element compositing into account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在考虑元素组合的情况下，鼠标指针的位置是否与命中测试结果相对应。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse pointer is over the same element result as a hit test; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果鼠标指针位于与命中测试; 相同的元素结果否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>, this property is only `true` if the mouse pointer is over the literal element—as it is for a hit test.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>，此属性才`true`如果鼠标指针位于 literal 元素-按原样命中测试。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse pointer is instead over a child element, in particular over elements that are part of an element's deeper template and compositing, this property will be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 而如果鼠标指针悬停在子元素上，具体而言，鼠标指针所包含的元素的更深层的模板和合成，元素，此属性将为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 除非你知道如何控件的组合 （例如，你使用此属性在自定义控件模板中的控件，你定义），此属性可能会返回意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数情况下不创作控件的情况，使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>相反。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured by this element, and this property is `true` at time of capture, this property will continue to return `true` until mouse capture is lost and the pointer is not over its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素是否捕获了鼠标，并且此属性是`true`在捕获时，此属性将继续返回`true`丢失鼠标捕获并且鼠标指针不位于其边界之前。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse pointer is located over this element (including child elements in the visual tree).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示鼠标指针是否位于此元素（包括可视化树中的子元素）的上方。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if mouse pointer is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标指针悬停于此元素或其子元素上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, controls are composited such that the various elements inside the control (the visual tree) will all report the mouse state for the containing control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，控件都是复合，以便控件 （可视树） 中的各种元素都将报告包含控件的鼠标状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> style control will report <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A> as `true` if the mouse is anywhere over its geometry, including any <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>样式控件将报告<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>作为`true`如果鼠标位于其几何图形，包括任何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。

trans-unit.source: Although an analogous "IsMouseOverChanged" event does not exist, several similar events do.
trans-unit.target: 尽管类似"等效于"事件不存在，将执行多个类似事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>，和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>。

trans-unit.source: If this element captures the mouse, this property remains `true` until mouse capture is lost and the mouse pointer leaves the element bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素捕获鼠标，则此属性保持`true`丢失鼠标捕获并且鼠标指针离开元素边界之前。

trans-unit.source: Some controls deliberately capture the mouse on certain actions that do not appear to directly involve the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 某些控件有意捕获鼠标似乎未直接涉及鼠标某些操作。

trans-unit.source: This can lead to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A> being `true` even though the mouse has not apparently moved.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会导致<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>正在`true`即使看似未移动鼠标。

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is over the control, the control text turns blue and the cursor becomes a hand.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标位于控件上方，控件文本将变为蓝色，光标变成手的形状。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the stylus is captured by this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示此元素是否捕获了触笔。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has stylus capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素具有触笔捕获，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether stylus capture is held by this element, or an element within the element bounds and its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定触笔捕获是由此元素还是由元素边界内的元素及其可视化树持有。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element or a contained element has stylus capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素或其包含的元素具有触笔捕获，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/63f1d71f-03d8-4d83-a174-e3dc7c57bad0) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Touch Windows Vista 中的输入支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/63f1d71f-03d8-4d83-a174-e3dc7c57bad0)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 这是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus position corresponds to hit test results, which take element compositing into account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在考虑元素组合的情况下，触笔的位置是否与命中测试结果相对应。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus pointer is over the same element result as a hit test; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果触笔指针与命中测试位于同一元素结果上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver%2A>, this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver%2A>，此属性才`true`如果触笔位于元素上。

trans-unit.source: If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing (the visual tree), this property will be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果触笔改为子元素或元素上方的元素的更深入地组合 （可视树） 的一部分，此属性将`false`。

trans-unit.source: Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 除非你知道如何控件的组合 （例如，你使用此属性在自定义控件模板中的控件，你定义），此属性可能会返回意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数情况下不创作控件的情况，使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver%2A>相反。

trans-unit.source: If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有触笔捕获，并且此属性为`true`捕获时，此属性将保持`true`丢失触笔捕获并且触笔不到其边界之前。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。
