trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusDirectlyOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the stylus cursor is located over this element (including visual child elements).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示触笔指针是否位于此元素（包括可视化子元素）的上方。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if stylus cursor is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果触笔光标位于此元素或其子元素上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this element has stylus capture, this property will continue to return `true` until stylus capture is lost and the pointer is out of its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有触笔捕获，此属性将继续返回`true`直到触笔捕获为丢失，指针超出界限。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsStylusOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element is visible in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中是否可见。

trans-unit.source: This is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 这是依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determination of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible%2A> value takes all factors of layout into account.
trans-unit.target: 确定<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible%2A>值将布局的所有因素考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>, which is a settable property, only indicates the intention to programmatically make an element visible or invisible.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>，这是可设置属性，仅表示想要以编程方式使元素可见或不可见。

trans-unit.source: Elements where <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible%2A> is `false` do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the measure or arrange passes of layout, are not focusable, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing.
trans-unit.target: 元素其中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible%2A>是`false`不参与输入的事件 （或命令），请执行不影响的测量或排列布局，不可获得焦点，不在 tab 键序列中，并且将不会报告中的命中测试。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, elements where <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> is `false` will still participate in events and commands, and hit testing, but are also not focusable.
trans-unit.target: 相反，元素其中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>是`false`仍将参与事件或命令，以及命中测试，但不还可获得焦点。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised if the element is not being rendered by the layout system, for reasons other than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素不呈现为以外的值的原因的布局系统，则不会引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the element might not have an associated visual.
trans-unit.target: 例如，元素可能没有关联的可视。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsVisible" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while focus is on this element.
trans-unit.target: 当焦点在该元素上时按下某个键后发生。

trans-unit.source: Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition.
trans-unit.target: 密钥处理与其他平台功能，例如发出命令和文本组合进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件是可能无法如期出现在某些控件上的较低级别文本输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events.
trans-unit.target: 这是文本的因为某些控件有控件组合或提供的更高级别的版本的类处理输入处理和相关事件。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnKeyDown%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnKeyDown%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while focus is on this element.
trans-unit.target: 当焦点在该元素上时松开某个键后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnKeyUp%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.

trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the layout of the various visual elements associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在与当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 关联的各种可视元素的布局更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: A layout update can occur as a result of a property change, a window resize, or an explicit user request.
trans-unit.target: 布局更新会导致属性更改、 调整窗口大小或显式用户请求发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素丢失逻辑焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制失去了焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A> method is called still gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下、 其所在的键盘焦点保持和元素其中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focus%2A>调用方法仍获取逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A>路线中的元素的属性更改从`true`到`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，失去焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。

trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element,.
trans-unit.target: 在键盘焦点不再位于此元素上时发生。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素丢失鼠标捕获时发生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在指针位于超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获了鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，丢失捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定丢失捕获的实际元素中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses stylus capture.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素丢失触笔捕获时发生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使在指针位于超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常，将触笔捕获仅在拖放操作过程。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，失去焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定实际失去焦点的元素中。

trans-unit.target: 当操作遇到边界时发生。

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationBoundaryFeedback" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a manipulation and inertia on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object is complete.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 对象的操作和延时完毕时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to get information about the manipulation when it completes.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于完成时获取有关操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationCompletedEventArgs.TotalManipulation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the total amount the position of the manipulation changed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationCompletedEventArgs.TotalManipulation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定总金额的操作的位置更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationCompleted" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input device changes position during a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 当输入设备在操作期间更改位置时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurs multiple times when the user drags fingers over the screen during a manipulation and again when inertia occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件出现多次，当用户拖动手指在屏幕上在操作过程后再试惯性发生时。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.IsInertial%2A> property to check whether the event is occurring during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.IsInertial%2A>属性检查是否在惯性期间出现事件。

trans-unit.source: The element on with <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurs is not affected in any way when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 元素上的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件发生在事件发生时不影响以任何方式。

trans-unit.source: You must provide the logic to the element that is to be manipulated.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供到要操作的元素的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> properties, which are of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>, contain data about how the position of the manipulations change and interpreted as moving, resizing, or rotating an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A>属性，这些类型的属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>，包含有关如何更改该操作的位置的数据，并且解释为移动、 调整大小或旋转对象。

trans-unit.source: You apply that information to the element that is to be manipulated.
trans-unit.target: 将该信息应用到要操作的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EventHandler%601> of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler%601>类型<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> property to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A>属性用于移动、 调整大小，请和旋转<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>。

trans-unit.source: The example also checks whether the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将检查是否<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>惯性和矩形是否处理窗口的边缘期间发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果这种情况下都为真，应用程序将停止操作后，若要防止将应用程序的可见区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input device loses contact with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object during a manipulation and inertia begins.
trans-unit.target: 当输入设备在操作期间与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 对象失去联系且延时开始时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> event occurs when the user lifts all of the fingers from the screen during a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>时在用户在操作过程中抬起手指从屏幕的所有事件发生。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user "throws" a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> across a surface, the user will touch the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to begin the action, move the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then release the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户的"引发"<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>在表面，用户将触摸<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>要开始操作，在以短距离，屏幕上移动上方的手指，然后松开<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the element, inertia begins and the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放元素时，开始惯性和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> continues to receive <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> events to indicate that inertia is occurring on the element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>继续接收在<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>事件，指出在元素上发生了惯性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to specify the behavior of the inertia.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于指定惯性的行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the initial velocity that is used when inertia begins.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置惯性开始时使用的初始速度。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the amount of inertia by setting the desired deceleration or by setting the desired placement.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置所需的减速或通过设置所需的位置，还可以指定惯性量。

trans-unit.source: You can set these values for each type of manipulation (translation, expansion, or rotation) independently.
trans-unit.target: 您可以单独设置每种类型操作 （翻译、 扩展或旋转） 的这些值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>事件处理程序和设置需要的减速转换、 扩展以及在惯性过程中使用的旋转。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an input device begins a manipulation on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当输入设备对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 对象开始操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarted> event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarted>事件发生后<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can do the following with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs>:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过执行以下<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs>:

trans-unit.source: Get the element that the manipulation's position is relative to by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取操作的位置是相对于使用的元素<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Get the origin of the manipulation by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用获取操作的原点<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Cancel the manipulation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.Complete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用取消操作<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.Complete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EventHandler%601> of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler%601>类型<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarted" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarted" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the manipulation processor is first created.
trans-unit.target: 在首次创建操作处理器时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> event occurs on an element that has the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled%2A> property set to `true` when the user puts a finger on it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>上具有的元素，发生事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`当用户在其上将手指。

trans-unit.source: By default, subsequent manipulation events report the position of the manipulation relative to the element that has <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，后续操作事件报告的位置相对于元素具有操作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsManipulationEnabled%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定位置应为相对于另一个元素通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can make the manipulation relative to the parent of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以相对于元素的父级的操作。

trans-unit.source: You can also do the following in an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>:
trans-unit.target: 你还可以执行的事件处理程序中的以下<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>:

trans-unit.source: Specify whether the user needs more than one finger to perform the manipulations by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.IsSingleTouchEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定用户是否需要通过设置执行操作的多个手指<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.IsSingleTouchEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Mode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指定哪些类型的操作启用通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Mode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置指定单指旋转中心的<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Cancel the manipulation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用取消操作<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EventHandler%601> of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> event and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> to the parent element that receives the manipulation events so that the coordinates of the manipulation are relative to the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting>事件和集<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A>接收操作事件，以便操作的坐标相对于父元素的父元素。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The available space that a parent element can allocate a child element.
trans-unit.target: 父元素可以为子元素分配的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: A child element can request a larger space than what is available; the provided size might be accommodated if scrolling is possible in the content model for the current element.
trans-unit.target: 子元素可以请求大于可用空间的空间；如果可在当前元素的内容模型中进行滚动，则提供的大小可以适应此空间。

trans-unit.source: Updates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.DesiredSize" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Parent elements call this method from their own <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore(System.Windows.Size)" /> implementations to form a recursive layout update.
trans-unit.target: 父元素从其自身的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore(System.Windows.Size)" /> 实现调用此方法以形成递归布局更新。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method constitutes the first pass (the "Measure" pass) of a layout update.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法构成布局更新的第一个处理过程（“测量”处理过程）。

trans-unit.source: Computation of layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] is comprised of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call and an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 中的布局位置的计算[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]组成<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>调用和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call, an element determines its size requirements by using an `availableSize` input.
trans-unit.target: 期间<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>调用，元素通过确定其大小要求`availableSize`输入。

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call, the element size is finalized.
trans-unit.target: 期间<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>完成调用时，元素大小。

trans-unit.source: `availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinite.
trans-unit.target: `availableSize` 可以是任何数字从零到无限。

trans-unit.source: Elements participating in layout should return the minimum <xref:System.Windows.Size> they require for a given `availableSize`.
trans-unit.target: 参与布局的元素应返回的最小<xref:System.Windows.Size>它们需要给定`availableSize`。

trans-unit.source: When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call before <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当首次实例化布局时，它始终会收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>之前调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call without a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>; this can happen when a property that affects only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> without a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 但是后第一个布局处理过程，, 它可能会收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用而无需<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>; 这可能会在一个属性，仅影响<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>更改 （如对齐方式），或当父收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>而无需<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> call will automatically invalidate an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>调用将自动使失效<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Layout updates happen asynchronously, such that the main thread is not waiting for every possible layout change.
trans-unit.target: 布局更新异步发生，以便主线程并不会等待每个可能的布局更改。

trans-unit.source: Querying an element via code-behind checking of property values may not immediately reflect changes to properties that interact with the sizing or layout characteristics (the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property, for example).
trans-unit.target: 查询通过隐藏代码检查的属性值的元素可能不会立即反映对交互具有调整大小或布局特性的属性的更改 (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>属性，例如)。

trans-unit.source: Layout updates can be forced by using the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过强制布局更新<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.UpdateLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, calling this method is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance.
trans-unit.target: 但是，调用此方法是通常不必要的并且可能会导致性能不佳。

trans-unit.source: The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> and one for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 布局系统保留的一些无效的布局，一个用于两个单独的队列<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>，另一个用于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree of the element performing layout; elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents.
trans-unit.target: 根据执行布局; 的元素的可视化树中的元素的顺序排序布局队列元素树中更高版本是队列，以便避免冗余布局父级中的重复更改所造成的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already layout-validated.
trans-unit.target: 从队列中，自动删除重复项，并且如果它们尚存在布局验证自动从队列删除元素。

trans-unit.source: When updating layout, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> queue is emptied first, followed by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> queue.
trans-unit.target: 更新布局时，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>队列为空首先后, 跟<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>队列。

trans-unit.source: An element in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A> queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> queue.
trans-unit.target: 中的某个元素<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Arrange%2A>中的某个元素时，绝不会排列队列<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>队列。

trans-unit.source: The available size that the parent element can allocate for the child.
trans-unit.target: 父元素可以为子元素分配的可用大小。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides measurement logic for sizing this element properly, with consideration of the size of any child element content.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，提供测量逻辑来适当地调整此元素的大小，兼顾任何子元素内容的大小。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of this element in layout.
trans-unit.target: 此元素在布局中的所需大小。

trans-unit.source: It is more common to derive an element from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> rather than <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 它是更常见的是派生的元素从<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>而非<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you are deriving from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, note that an override of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> seals the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，请注意，重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>密封<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you only override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> as a means to alter layout measure characteristics if you derive from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> through an inheritance that does not include <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你只覆盖<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>作为一种方法更改布局测量特征，如果派生自<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>通过不包括继承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: This might be the case if you are attempting to build your own implementation on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core-level.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试在上生成您自己的实现，这可能是这种情况[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心级别。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if you are deriving from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, then the implementation template for Measure behavior is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> implementation of .<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果派生自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，度量值行为的实现模板则<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>的实现。<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A parent element with child elements must call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on each child, otherwise these child elements are not sized or arranged and will effectively disappear from layout.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的父元素必须调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>在每个的子活动，否则为这些子元素不调整大小或排列和有效地将从布局中消失。

trans-unit.source: A typical override of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> follows this approximate pattern (there is not a built-in collection called `VisualChildren`; `VisualChildren` is a placeholder that represents whatever child collection your element maintains).
trans-unit.target: 典型重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>遵循这种近似模式 (不是一个名为的内置集合`VisualChildren`;`VisualChildren`是一个占位符，表示你元素维护任何子集合)。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on each child element.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>每个子元素上。

trans-unit.source: Generally, your implementation should cache measurement information between the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> method calls in the same element.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，您的实现应缓存之间的测量信息<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>方法调用在同一元素。

trans-unit.source: Calling base implementations of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> is not required, but might be appropriate if the base implementation provides a desired layout capability.
trans-unit.target: 调用的基实现<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>不是必需的但在的基实现，提供所需的布局功能可能正合适。

trans-unit.source: Calls to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> on child elements should pass either the same `availableSize` as the parent, or a subset of the area, depending on the type of layout the parent element supports.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>上子元素应传递属于相同`availableSize`作为的父项或区域的子集，具体取决于的布局的类型的父元素支持。

trans-unit.source: For example, it would be valid to remove the area for an element-specific border or padding, a scrollbar, or a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它将有效以删除特定元素的边框或填充、 滚动条，或自定义控件的区域。

trans-unit.source: Implementations must be able to process a value provided for <paramref name="availableSize" /> that is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 实现必须能够处理提供的值<paramref name="availableSize" />即无限。

trans-unit.source: An infinite value indicates no requested constraints, and effectively defers measurement choice to the parent element, through recursive Measure calls.
trans-unit.target: 无限值表示没有请求的约束，并有效地将推迟到父元素，通过递归调用度量值的度量值选择。

trans-unit.source: Implementations can consider the value provided for <paramref name="availableSize" /> to be a soft constraint.
trans-unit.target: 实现可以考虑为提供的值<paramref name="availableSize" />要软约束。

trans-unit.source: The child element might specify a larger size, even if other aspects of application code were able to determine the current actual size of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 子元素可能指定更大的大小，即使应用程序代码的其他方面是能够确定父元素的当前实际大小。

trans-unit.source: The large size request is a convention that indicates that the child element is querying whether your parent element can support content scrolling within a content display region.
trans-unit.target: 大的大小，请求是指示子元素查询您的父元素是否可以支持内容滚动内容的显示区域内的约定。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在指针位于此元素上并且按下任意鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event is often raised together with either <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>, which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>事件通常一起引发<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>，这对应于按下的某个之一的两个标准鼠标按钮。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown> are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event reaches this element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> 和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>也是路由的事件，但它们是直接路由的事件，并引发相应的按钮特定事件时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件到达事件路由中的此元素。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注以<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 某些控件可能具有固有鼠标按钮事件处理的类。

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control.
trans-unit.target: 按下事件鼠标左键是最可能的事件，能够在控件中处理的类。

trans-unit.source: The class handling often marks the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 类通常处理标记基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>类为已处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 一旦事件被标记为已处理，其他实例处理程序附加到该元素通常不会引发。

trans-unit.source: Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 通常也不会引发的任何其他类或实例处理程序附加到冒泡方向向 UI 树的根节点中的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions:
trans-unit.target: 可以解决前面的重要说明中介绍了此问题，从而仍在接收<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>鼠标左键按下具有类处理通过使用这些解决方案的派生类上的事件的事件：

trans-unit.source: Attach handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event, which is not marked as handled by the controls.
trans-unit.target: 附加处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>未标记为已由控件处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于这是预览事件，则路由从根开始并挖掘到控件。

trans-unit.source: Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A> and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data.
trans-unit.target: ： 分步骤注册控件上的处理程序，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>并选择使处理程序能够侦听事件，即使它们已标记为已处理路由的事件数据中的签名选项。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 冒泡

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>.
trans-unit.target: 对应的隧道事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseDown%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseDown%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针进入此元素的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> 是，使用直接的事件处理路由策略。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 在路由过程; 不会引发直接路由的事件相反，它们是在中处理同一个元素引发它们时。

trans-unit.source: However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它们启用路由的事件的行为，如样式中的事件触发器其他的方面。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>跟踪何时鼠标指针进入的元素边界内，此事件能够更确切地报告<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>属性值已更改，不再`false`到`true`针对此元素。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> (or any <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> derived class) has native handling for a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event when the button has focus, and the pressed key is the space bar.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>派生类) 具有本机处理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件按钮有焦点，并按下的键是空间条。

trans-unit.source: The native handling raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event with the button as the source, and also captures the mouse, even though the mouse pointer does not appear to move.
trans-unit.target: 本机处理引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>与作为源，该按钮的事件并且还会捕获鼠标，即使鼠标指针似乎未移动。

trans-unit.source: As a result of the mouse capture, a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event is also raised with the button as the source.
trans-unit.target: 由于鼠标捕获，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>与作为源的按钮也会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In general, if an element captures the mouse, then <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> is raised, as well as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture> and possibly other control-specific events.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果在元素捕获鼠标，然后<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>引发时，以及<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotMouseCapture>以及可能其他特定于控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseEnter%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseEnter%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针离开此元素的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> 是，使用直接的事件处理路由策略。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 在路由过程; 不会引发直接路由的事件相反，它们是在中处理同一个元素引发它们时。

trans-unit.source: However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它们启用路由的事件的行为，如样式中的事件触发器其他的方面。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> tracks when the mouse leaves an element, this event more literally reports that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>跟踪何时鼠标离开元素，此事件的详细信息确切地报告<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseOver%2A>属性值已更改，不再`true`到`false`针对此元素。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseLeave%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseLeave%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且按下鼠标左键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Although this seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这看起来要遵循的冒泡通过元素树路由，但它实际上是直接的路由的事件引发和每个元素树沿遵循<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是报告鼠标按钮特定信息的基础的几个相关事件之一<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，即处理为由事件路由每个元素的附加的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的事件数据公开的事件数据的基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>, with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果该事件被标记为已处理事件路由过程，则仍会引发的鼠标按钮特定事件;但是，必须通过显式调用添加的鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>，使用选项来处理已标记为已处理的事件，以便将事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: If you mark <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> handled, you are essentially marking <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>处理，您实质上标记<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>处理沿路由的所有其他侦听器和所有相关事件。

trans-unit.source: This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>.
trans-unit.target: 这可能包括类处理程序生成事件，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class).
trans-unit.target: 从概念上讲，将此事件 (和其他鼠标按钮事件上的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>) 视为鼠标"服务"(使用提供的服务定义<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>类)。

trans-unit.source: The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件将添加不需要检查鼠标按钮状态 （从左至右，向上向下） 的事件数据中的原始鼠标事件的便利性。

trans-unit.source: For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class rather than those on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 对于更高级的方案，例如检查非标准按钮的状态，你可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>上类而不是那些<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: Some control classes might have inherent class handling for mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 某些控件类可能具有固有鼠标按钮事件处理的类。

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control.
trans-unit.target: 按下事件鼠标左键是最可能的事件，能够在控件中处理的类。

trans-unit.source: The class handling often marks the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 类通常处理标记基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>类为已处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 一旦事件被标记为已处理，其他实例处理程序附加到该元素通常不会引发。

trans-unit.source: Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 通常也不会引发的任何其他类或实例处理程序附加到冒泡方向向 UI 树的根节点中的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions:
trans-unit.target: 可以解决前面的重要说明中介绍了此问题，从而仍在接收<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>鼠标左键按下具有类处理通过使用这些解决方案的派生类上的事件的事件：

trans-unit.source: Attach handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event, which is not marked as handled by the controls.
trans-unit.target: 附加处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>未标记为已由控件处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于这是预览事件，则路由从根开始并挖掘到控件。

trans-unit.source: Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A> and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data.
trans-unit.target: ： 分步骤注册控件上的处理程序，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>并选择使处理程序能够侦听事件，即使它们已标记为已处理路由的事件数据中的签名选项。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且移动鼠标指针时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Right button mouse events frequently have native handling in application scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 右侧的按钮的鼠标事件，通常在应用程序方案具有本机处理。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a right mouse button down might display a context menu.
trans-unit.target: 例如，向下的鼠标右键按钮可能显示上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: See [ContextMenu Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[ContextMenu 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md)。

trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the right mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且松开鼠标右键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Although this seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管这看起来要遵循的冒泡通过元素树路由，但它实际上是直接的路由的事件引发和每个元素树沿遵循<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是报告鼠标按钮特定信息的基础的几个相关事件之一<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，即处理为由事件路由每个元素的附加的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的事件数据公开的事件数据的基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>, with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果该事件被标记为已处理事件路由过程，则仍会引发的鼠标按钮特定事件;但是，必须通过显式调用添加的鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>，使用选项来处理已标记为已处理的事件，以便将事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: If you mark <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp> handled, you are essentially marking <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>处理，您实质上标记<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>处理沿路由的所有其他侦听器和所有相关事件。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class).
trans-unit.target: 从概念上讲，将此事件 (和其他鼠标按钮事件上的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>) 视为鼠标"服务"(使用提供的服务定义<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>类)。

trans-unit.source: The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件将添加不需要检查鼠标按钮状态 （从左至右，向上向下） 的事件数据中的原始鼠标事件的便利性。

trans-unit.source: For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class rather than those on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 对于更高级的方案，例如检查非标准按钮的状态，你可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>上类而不是那些<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnMouseRightButtonUp%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any mouse button is released over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且松开任意鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp> event is often raised together with either <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>, which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp>事件通常一起引发<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>，这对应于两个标准鼠标按钮之一的版本。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp> are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event reaches this element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> 和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>也是路由的事件，但它们是直接路由的事件，并引发相应的按钮特定事件时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件到达事件路由中的此元素。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注以<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且用户滚动鼠标滚轮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel> event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element.
trans-unit.target: 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于其中鼠标指针位于;因此，如果你收到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>的已设定焦点或捕获元素中的事件，鼠标指针实际上可能是通过另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。
